item.title: CVE-2024-6886|2024-08-06T03:23:21.692Z -- gitea -- gitea%20open%20source%20git%20server
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Gitea Gitea Open Source Git Server allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Gitea Open Source Git Server: 1.22.0.
